column4: could someone _please_ help me add this link to my repos .. i have tried everything and its not working  http://people.debian.org/~dopey/fluxbox/ubuntu-breezy/fluxbox_0.9.14-1_i386.deb   :/
you can't add a direct URL to a deb
is it really an ubuntu repository or is it just a link to a .deb?
then you can't put it in sources.list. download the .deb and sudo dpkg -i it
